subject: Hello Friend,
body:
Hello Friend,
I wanted to know if you will be able to find someone who can move funds that is in cash, out from here in Istanbul Turkey.The cash came from Russia the land borders in the name of family treasure. The total amount is $1.5 Million USD.
Commission is 30% to you and 70% for proposed projects.We can either move it through a private shipping Courier service to your destination Address, or through bank to bank transfer. Let us discuss more if you are ready to do this business with me
Reply to my private Email Address at: 
davidwillims322@gmail.com
Thanks for your understanding
David William

subject: Re: Hello Friend,
body:
Hello David William,

Wow, that sounds like quite an adventure! I'm intrigued by your proposal. Could you please tell me more about how this process works? How does one move such a large amount of money safely and securely?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Javier

subject: Re: Hello Friend,
body:
Hello  Javier

Your messenger received with thanks, send your WhatsApp number, so that I
will call you for more discussion thanks
David William

subject: Re: Hello Friend,
body:
Hello David William,

Thank you for your response. I'm glad to hear from you. However, I prefer to keep our conversation here for now. Could you please share more details about the topic we are going to discuss? I'm really interested in learning more.

Best wishes,
Javier
